cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplatePlainText:
Pages have been submitted for translation. The source text and instructions are enclosed in a ZIP file.
This submission was created with priority {% GetTranslationPriority(Submission.SubmissionPriority) |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)d9cdc9a86217cafec525566332564df5ab60b686d9294cc6648c67fc67896470%} and is due by {% Submission.SubmissionDeadline |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)8e186d0df3ccd43f6950367b5e8dc55cc1c07fcf6fe45cdd76a2aa57832fb5b4%}.
To upload a ZIP archive with the completed translation, go to the following URL {% SubmissionLink %}.
